page.title: 02OUR LIVES AND INTERESTS.
page.content: {I am Bronia Williams}and on Tuesdays I go to Girl Guides. We do various activities working for badges. Most years we go camping in the summer. We wear a neckerchief around our necks. It is held in place by a leather strap called a woggle. {My name is Kathryn Evans.}I have two sisters and two brothers. My mum and dad are divorced and I live with my mum. She does not work. My two brothers live in London. I take after my dad's side of the family. I was born in Wales and brought up in London. {I am Kathy Charlton.}My mum and dad both work. My Mum in a bank, and my dad on aeroplane design. My hobby is collecting pictures of Princess Diana. My pets are a dog, a rabbit and a fish. My brother's hobby is bird watching.
